profile.description: Graduated from EPITA (2024), a renowned French engineering school in computer science, I create smooth apps with React, Vue.js, Node.js, and Django. I’ve developed a pipeline editor (Vue.js), a B2C eco-friendly app (React Native/Go), an intranet (Django), and an e-commerce site in progress (React/Node). Technical challenge? I love it! Ready to collaborate? Contact me!

items.title: Business Analyst
items.description: I collaborated with external business stakeholders (end users of iPension) to understand their needs and existing processes. Studied the existing application (iPension 1st), performed bug analysis on the PC theme, and continuously optimized processes. Drafted detailed functional specifications for the implementation of new features. Designed and monitored functionalities that simplify the processing of complementary benefit cases while ensuring compliance with legal guidelines. Optimized and streamlined existing processes.

items.title: Fullstack Developer - Final Internship
items.description: I developed an electricity consumption tracking module for a customer portal using Drupal and TailwindCSS, integrating consumption habit analysis and optimization suggestions. In collaboration with product teams, I designed ergonomic interfaces, improving the experience for more than 14,000 customers.

items.title: Fullstack Developer - Internship
items.description: I continued the development of the internal CRM: implemented new features, fixed bugs, optimized performance, and improved error handling. Additionally, I introduced safeguards to secure and stabilize the application. Used Python (Flask) for the backend. Contributed to improving the reliability and efficiency of the internal CRM.
